ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cxx_compiler:
- gxx
cxx_compiler_version:
- '14'
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
libxml2_devel:
- '2.14'
target_platform:
- linux-64
zlib:
- '1'

about.description:
builtins - low-level target-specific hooks required by code generation and other
  runtime components
sanitizer runtimes - AddressSanitizer, ThreadSanitizer, UndefinedBehaviorSanitizer,
  MemorySanitizer, LeakSanitizer, DataFlowSanitizer
profile - library which is used to collect coverage information
BlocksRuntime - target-independent implementation of Apple "Blocks" runtime
  interfaces

name: compiler-rt-packages

about.description:
builtins - low-level target-specific hooks required by code generation and other
  runtime components
sanitizer runtimes - AddressSanitizer, ThreadSanitizer, UndefinedBehaviorSanitizer,
  MemorySanitizer, LeakSanitizer, DataFlowSanitizer
profile - library which is used to collect coverage information
BlocksRuntime - target-independent implementation of Apple "Blocks" runtime
  interfaces

builtins - low-level target-specific hooks required by code generation and other
  runtime components
sanitizer runtimes - AddressSanitizer, ThreadSanitizer, UndefinedBehaviorSanitizer,
  MemorySanitizer, LeakSanitizer, DataFlowSanitizer
profile - library which is used to collect coverage information
BlocksRuntime - target-independent implementation of Apple "Blocks" runtime
  interfaces

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "21.1.8" %}
{% set major_ver = version.split('.')[0] %}

package:
  name: compiler-rt-packages
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/llvm/llvm-project/archive/refs/tags/llvmorg-{{ version.replace(".rc", "-rc") }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 7ba3f2a8d8fda88be18a31d011e8195d3b7f87f9fa92b20c94cba2d7f65b0e3f
  patches:
    - patches/0001-no-code-sign.patch
    - patches/0002-Revert-Declare-_availability_version_check-as-weak_i.patch

build:
  number: 0

requirements:
  build:
    - cmake >=3.4.3
    - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - {{ stdlib('c') }}
    - python *
    - ninja
    - llvmdev {{ version }}  # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - llvmdev {{ version }}
    - libcxx   # [osx]
    - zlib
    - libxml2-devel

outputs:
  - name: libcompiler-rt
    build:
      run_exports:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libcompiler-rt", max_pin=None) }}
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ stdlib('c') }}
      host:
      run:
      run_constrained:
        # This is when compiler-rt and compiler-rt_{{ target_platform }} split
        - compiler-rt >=9.0.1
    files:
      - lib/libclang_rt*.so        # [linux]
      - lib/libclang_rt*.dylib     # [osx]
      - Library/bin/clang_rt*.dll  # [win]
    test:
      commands:
        - test -f $PREFIX/lib/libclang_rt.asan_osx_dynamic.dylib               # [osx]
        - test -f $PREFIX/lib/libclang_rt.tsan-x86_64.so                       # [linux and x86_64]
        - if not exist %LIBRARY_BIN%\clang_rt.asan_dynamic-x86_64.dll exit 1   # [win]

  - name: compiler-rt{{ major_ver }}_{{ target_platform }}
    build:
      noarch: generic
      ignore_run_exports_from:
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ stdlib('c') }}
      detect_binary_files_with_prefix: false  # [win]
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ stdlib('c') }}
      host:
      run:
      run_constrained:
        # This is when compiler-rt and compiler-rt_{{ target_platform }} split
        - compiler-rt >=9.0.1
    files:
      - lib/clang/{{ major_ver }}/lib   # [unix]
      # avoid "Library\" for noarch output
      - lib\clang\{{ major_ver }}\lib   # [win]
    test:
      commands:
        - test -f $PREFIX/lib/clang/{{ major_ver }}/lib/darwin/libclang_rt.osx.a                            # [osx]
        - if not exist %PREFIX%\lib\clang\{{ major_ver }}\lib\windows\clang_rt.builtins-x86_64.lib exit 1   # [win]

  - name: compiler-rt{{ major_ver }}
    requirements:
      build:
        - {{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - {{ stdlib('c') }}
      host:
      run:
        - compiler-rt{{ major_ver }}_{{ target_platform }} {{ version }}
    files:
      - lib/clang/{{ major_ver }}/share             # [unix]
      - lib/clang/{{ major_ver }}/include           # [unix]
      # standard windows layout for arch-specific output
      - Library\lib\clang\{{ major_ver }}\share     # [win]
      - Library\lib\clang\{{ major_ver }}\include   # [win]
      - Library\lib\clang\{{ major_ver }}\lib       # [win]
    test:
      # files:
      #   - test.c.in
      commands:
        # TODO: move this test to clang
        # {% set NEW_TARGET="10." ~ (((MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET|default("10.13")).split(".")[1])|int + 1) %}
        # - sed "s/@MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET@/{{ NEW_TARGET }}/g" test.c.in > test.c
        # - clang -mmacosx-version-min={{ MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET }} test.c  # [osx]
        - test -f $PREFIX/lib/clang/{{ major_ver }}/include/sanitizer/asan_interface.h                      # [unix]
        - if not exist %LIBRARY_LIB%\clang\{{ major_ver }}\lib\windows\clang_rt.builtins-x86_64.lib exit 1  # [win]

  - name: compiler-rt_{{ target_platform }}
    build:
      noarch: generic
    requirements:
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("compiler-rt" ~ major_ver ~ "_" ~ target_platform, exact=True) }}
      run_constrained:
        - clang {{ version }}
    test:
      commands:
        - test -f $PREFIX/lib/clang/{{ major_ver }}/lib/darwin/libclang_rt.osx.a                            # [osx]
        - if not exist %PREFIX%\lib\clang\{{ major_ver }}\lib\windows\clang_rt.builtins-x86_64.lib exit 1   # [win]

  - name: compiler-rt
    requirements:
      run:
        - {{ pin_subpackage("compiler-rt" ~ major_ver, exact=True) }}
        - {{ pin_subpackage("libcompiler-rt", exact=True) }}
      run_constrained:
        - clang {{ version }}
    test:
      commands:
        - test -f $PREFIX/lib/clang/{{ major_ver }}/include/sanitizer/asan_interface.h                      # [unix]
        - if not exist %LIBRARY_LIB%\clang\{{ major_ver }}\lib\windows\clang_rt.builtins-x86_64.lib exit 1  # [win]

about:
  home: http://llvm.org/
  license: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception
  license_file: compiler-rt/LICENSE.TXT
  summary: compiler-rt runtime libraries
  dev_url: https://github.com/llvm/llvm-project
  description: |
    builtins - low-level target-specific hooks required by code generation and other
      runtime components
    sanitizer runtimes - AddressSanitizer, ThreadSanitizer, UndefinedBehaviorSanitizer,
      MemorySanitizer, LeakSanitizer, DataFlowSanitizer
    profile - library which is used to collect coverage information
    BlocksRuntime - target-independent implementation of Apple "Blocks" runtime
      interfaces

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - SylvainCorlay
    - inducer
    - jakirkham
    - isuruf
    - h-vetinari
  feedstock-name: compiler-rt

about.description:
builtins - low-level target-specific hooks required by code generation and other
  runtime components
sanitizer runtimes - AddressSanitizer, ThreadSanitizer, UndefinedBehaviorSanitizer,
  MemorySanitizer, LeakSanitizer, DataFlowSanitizer
profile - library which is used to collect coverage information
BlocksRuntime - target-independent implementation of Apple "Blocks" runtime
  interfaces
